remarks: Limit on the number of ` N ` -th roots of unity in an integral domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
idomodle.g $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s ( Unit ` R ) ) $.
idomodle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
idomodle.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
idomodle $p |- ( ( R e. IDomn /\ N e. NN ) -> ( # ` { x e. B | ( O ` x ) || N } ) <_ N ) $.
$d B x $.
$d N x $.
$d R x $.
